name: Whitesand Coconut Tree
description: A tall tree that grows in warm, moist climates and produces a fruit with a hard outer shell and sweet meat inside. Chefs often use this fruit to make drinks.\nThe "Seven Mountain Treatises" records that the whiter the sand nearby, the better the quality of the coconuts that grow on the tree. For this reason, "Whitesand" is a term for coconut trees of the highest grade.
